actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to expand the Boulder Canyon project to provide for the construction of a highway crossing the Colorado River immediately downstream from Hoover Dam.

summary.text: Expands the Boulder Canyon project to provide for the construction of a highway crossing of the Colorado River immediately downstream from Hoover Dam. Authorizes to be appropriated $15,000,000 for the construction of such highway crossing.

titles.title: A bill to expand the Boulder Canyon project to provide for the construction of a highway crossing the Colorado River immediately downstream from Hoover Dam.
